attributes.action: Stop the second national lockdown in England.
attributes.additional_details: The United Kingdom has been hit by one of the worst recessions in modern times. The coronavirus has been made out to be much worse than it actually is. We need to get people back to work to build the economy back up to where it was. If this this isn’t done, there will be major unemployment and poverty.
attributes.background: Take down lockdown restrictions and allow people to start work again. Give as much help and support to small and medium sized businesses as possible.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Repeal second National Lockdown: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557045

Do not implement a second national lockdown or other restrictions this winter: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/549862

Referendum on current restrictions and any further lockdowns: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551539
